discordauth-desc: Allows authentication via Discord OAuth2 with server and role membership verification
discordauth-error-invalid-state: Invalid authentication state. Please try again.
discordauth-error-token: Failed to exchange authorization code for access token.
discordauth-error-userinfo: Failed to retrieve Discord user information.
discordauth-error-not-member: You are not a member of the required Discord server.
discordauth-error-no-role: You do not have any of the required roles on the Discord server.
discordauth-error-no-account: No wiki account found and automatic account creation is disabled.
discordauth-username-selection-text: You are logging in from Discord as $1. Please choose a username for this wiki:
discordauth-username-hint: Only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens allowed.
discordauth-error-invalid-username: Invalid username. Please use only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.
discordauth-error-username-exists: This username already exists. Please choose a different one.
discordauth-link-not-logged-in: You must be logged in to link your Discord account.
discordauth-link-text: Connect your Discord account to this wiki to enable Discord login.
discordauth-link-benefit-1: Log in with Discord instead of password
discordauth-link-benefit-2: Your account will be verified via Discord server membership
discordauth-already-linked-text: Your wiki account is already linked to a Discord account.
discordauth-unlink-confirm-text: Are you sure you want to unlink your Discord account? You will no longer be able to log in using Discord.
discordauth-unlink-success: Your Discord account has been unlinked successfully.
discordauth-link-already-linked-other: This Discord account is already linked to another wiki account.
discordauth-link-success-text: Your Discord account $1 has been linked successfully.
discordauth-link-success-hint: You can now use Discord to log in to this wiki.
discordauth-mode-required-info: This wiki uses Discord-only authentication. You can only log in using Discord. Password authentication is disabled.
discordauth-linked-account-info: Your account is linked to Discord user '''$1'''. [$2 Manage Discord connection]
discordauth-not-linked-info: Your account is not linked to Discord. [$1 Link your Discord account] to enable Discord login.
discordauth-login-required-message: This wiki requires Discord authentication. Please use the Discord login button above.
discordauth-membership-check-intro: This tool checks all wiki users with linked Discord accounts to verify their current server membership and role status.
discordauth-membership-check-info-1: Checks are performed in real-time using the Discord API
discordauth-membership-check-info-2: Users without valid membership/roles can be blocked permanently
discordauth-membership-check-info-3: Requires a Discord Bot Token to be configured
discordauth-bot-token-required-text: This tool requires a Discord Bot Token to check server membership. The bot token allows the extension to query Discord's API for membership information.
discordauth-bot-token-howto: Create a Discord Bot, enable SERVER MEMBERS INTENT, add it to your server, and copy the token.
discordauth-no-linked-users: No users with linked Discord accounts found.
discordauth-block-confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently block user "$1"? They will not be able to access the wiki.
discordauth-block-reason: No longer a member of required Discord server or missing required role
discordauth-block-error: Failed to block user. Please try again.
discordauth-session-expired: Your Discord authentication session has expired. Please log in again.
